text: They both have booming careers in the world of fashion. And on Sunday, sisters Bella and Gigi Hadid both hit the runway for Brandon Maxwell's Fall / Winter 2018 show for New York Fashion Week. Bella, 21, strutted inside the Appel Room venue in a belted coat with furry slides while Gigi, 22, paired a sequined skirt with a hoodie.
